item.title: Celluloid Dreams Takes World Sales on Indian Venice Selection ‘Songs of Forgotten Trees,’ First Clip Unveiled (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: French sales outfit Celluloid Dreams has boarded world sales rights to “Songs of Forgotten Trees,” the debut feature from Indian filmmaker Anuparna Roy that will bow in Venice’s Hori
